Mental abacus ( MA ) is a system for performing rapid and precise arithmetic by manipulating a mental representation of an abacus , a physical calculation device .Previous work has speculated that MA is based on visual imagery , suggesting that it might be a method of representing exact number nonlinguistically , but given the limitations on visual working memory , it is unknown how MA structures could be stored .
